title: Azure DevTest Labs DNS initialisation
description: Configures DNS so that a VM may join a Vaultex domain

DNSservers.description: IP address of one or two DNS servers for the domain to join.

suffixsearchlist.description: One or more suffixes to search, including the domain FQDN that the VM is being joined to.

suffix.description: The domain FQDN the the VM is being joined to.
